name: One of Us Has to Die
name_original: One of Us Has to Die
description:
One room, one person, one table, one clock, one trigger, two stories. 

Content warning: rapid switching scenes/light, implied violence, swearing.

This is a submission for Brno Game Jam 2022 by The Alphabet Squad.

Lea Belejová: Design & Storyboard

Petra Filipová: Writing & Storyboard

Mitchel de Koning: Design &  Scripting

Sára Smoliar(ová): Composer & Storyboard
